price: Rabbiin nu qanansiisee, adabbii summaa’aa jalaas nu baraarse.
arabic: فَمَنَّ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡنَا وَوَقَىٰنَا عَذَابَ ٱلسَّمُومِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: famanna al-lahu ʿalaynā wawaqānā ʿadhāba al-samūmi
